targets.query: SELECT last("usage_idle") * -1 + 100 - last("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter
SELECT last("used_percent")  / 100 FROM "disk" WHERE ("path" =~ /md[3-9]/) AND $timeFilter GROUP BY "path"
SELECT last("usage_active") - last("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("usage_active") - last("usage_iowait") FROM "cpu" WHERE ("cpu" = 'cpu-total') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
